title: Don't know if I committed shirk or not, what to do? - #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: from some this I think I am committed sh and I'm confused about what can I do I don't have a crystal ball I can't know what you've committed something that confuses you how would I on Earth know what you've committed so you say she I was picking my nose and I think that I've committed sh how would I know or you said I saw a statue and I frustrated to it so I'm confused oh this is shik the first one was not shik so in order for the sheh to help you and assist you you have to explain to him I did this and this and this and I don't know if they has shik in it or not and Allah knows best so
